import { ArgTypes } from '@storybook/blocks';
import { Meta, Story, Canvas } from '@storybook/addon-docs';
import HOOTable, {
  IHOOTableProps, HOOTableStyle
} from './HOOTable';

<Meta title="Components/Tables/HOOTable" component={HOOTable} />

# HOOTable

## Item Interface
The `tableStyle` property has an exported enum to help set the values. See defintions below:

```ts
export enum HOOTableStyle {
  "Normal",
  "Compact"
}
```

To use, include table layout as children of the HOOTable component.

## Arguments

<ArgTypes of={HOOTable} />

export const Template = (args) => <HOOTable {...args}>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Icon</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Date Modifed</th>
      <th>Modified by</th>
      <th>File Size</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td><img alt="image" src="data:image/png;base64,&#x3D;&#x3D;"/></td>
      <td>ErosViverra.mp3 just a variable height of everything that is in the perfect state</td>
      <td>lmaggiore0</td>
      <td>2/4/2021</td>
      <td>30</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><img alt="image" src="data:image/png;base64,&#x3D;&#x3D;"/></td>

      <td>djans1</td>

      <td>66</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td><img alt="image" src="data:image/png;base64,"/></td>
      <td>Lacinia.tiff</td>
      <td>wbundy2</td>

    </tr>
    <tr>

    <tr>
      <th>Icon</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Date Modifed</th>
      <th>Modified by</th>
      <th>File Size</th>
    </tr>
  </tfoot>
</HOOTable>;

## Normal
<Canvas>
  <Story 
    name="Normal"
    args = { 
      { tableStyle: HOOTableStyle.Normal }
    }>
    {Template.bind({})}
  </Story>
</Canvas>

## Compact
<Canvas>
  <Story 
    name="Compact"
    args = { 
      { tableStyle: HOOTableStyle.Compact }
    }>
    {Template.bind({})}
  </Story>
</Canvas>

## Extending
<Canvas>
  <Story 
    name="Extending"
    args = { 
      { tableStyle: HOOTableStyle.Normal, rootElementAttributes: { style: { border: "5px solid black" } } }
    }>
    {Template.bind({})}
  </Story>
</Canvas>
